service-001.title: Smart Website & Sales Funnel
service-001.description: We don't just build websites; we create automated systems that find customers 24/7, collect their information, and ensure sales.

service-002.title: Complete Facebook Page Management
service-002.description: From page setup to content creation, regular posting, ad management, and message automation - we handle all Facebook responsibilities.

service-003.title: 24/7 AI Sales Agent
service-003.description: No customer has to wait anymore, even on holidays or late at night. Our AI agent converts every opportunity into a sale with instant responses.

service-004.title: Digital Marketing & Advertising
service-004.description: No more marketing based on guesswork. We analyze data to create ads and SEO strategies that ensure maximum profit on every dollar.

service-005.title: Mobile App Development
service-005.description: Custom mobile apps for your business. Reach your customers on Android and iOS platforms. Built with modern technology and beautiful design.

faq-001.question: What exactly do you do? Are you just a marketing agency?
faq-001.answer: We're not just a marketing agency. We're a complete digital solutions provider. We offer website development, social media management, AI chatbots, and automation solutions that improve every digital touchpoint of your business.

faq-002.question: How long does it take to start a service?
faq-002.answer: Usually we start work within 7-10 days of signing the contract. However, this time may vary depending on project complexity. We always try to start quickly and effectively.

faq-003.question: What is the cost of your services?
faq-003.answer: Our pricing is ROI-based. Every business has different needs, so we create customized packages. Contact us for a free strategy session to learn the right solution for your business.

faq-004.question: How does the AI agent work?
faq-004.answer: Our AI agent talks to your customers 24/7, answers their questions, collects leads, and hands over to human sales team when needed. It can work on Facebook Messenger, website chat, and WhatsApp.

faq-005.question: What is the best way to contact you?
faq-005.answer: You can contact us via phone (01639590392), email (rahmatullahzisan@gmail.com), or Facebook Messenger. Fill out the form below for a free strategy session.
